Past Shows

Written by Ayad Akhtar

Tara

Fall 2014



Directed by David Swigart

Produced by Varun Agarwal

Written by Mahesh Dattani

Not Quite The Western Front

Spring 2014



The Elephant

Written and Directed by Nikhil Venkatesa


A Problem of Perception

Written and Directed by by Hamza Qaiser

Fall 2013



Directed by Shreshth Khilani

Produced by Karishma Sabhnani

Written by Neel Chaudhuri

Spring 2013

The President is Coming
